divs: Sighting DetailsWorking and went outside to make a call. Saw many objects in the air. Many different sizes and colors. Flash lights, coming from them, kinda aura feeling. This lasted for about an hour over Inner NE Portland Oregon. Way north of Alberta Street and Possibly over Washington near Camas. I told my roommate who also saw along with a co-worker of mine.
Summary: I saw multiple UFO's last night of all different shapes, colors and sizes over NE Portland Oregon.
trends: There have been 158 other sightings in Portland
There were no other sightings in Portland on or around September 21st 2011
